featured.text: Korea and Japan 37 animal names and China likes names of gods such as Longwang (dragon king) and Fengshen (god of the wind).
The most familiar aspect of Tai Chi Chuan is the hand form, which is a series of slow-flowing movements with poetic names 17 “dragons stirring up the wind” and “wave hands like clouds.”
And how good a magic sword would feel in our hand as we go off to kill a dragon or win the hand of a beautiful princess.

definition.zh_def: 一種傳說中的生物，通常被描繪為大型爬行動物，具有翅膀和噴火的能力。
definition.en_def: A mythical creature typically depicted as a large reptilian being with wings and the ability to breathe fire.
definition.example: The dragon soared high above the mountains, its scales glinting in the sunlight.
